title: Unwell
description: Azley is killing the single mom game. She has potty breaks and game time down to a science. All she needs to ease her bruised and broken heart is her son, and her support system.Evan will do anything to get what he wants, and he wants Azley. Sweet with his words, yet dirty and domineering in the bedroom, he's everything she ever wanted in a man, but he's a little too late. She wants to live for the moment, determined to prove you can live life without love. He wants to give her forever, determined to show her a life filled with love is worth living. Can Evan break through Azley's armor and mend her tattered soul, or has she truly become bulletproof? A second chance at love. A second chance at life. Would you fight for them, or let them go? Book 1 in the series, it is a complete novel and may be read as a standalone.
author: Robin Laine
